about_the_game:
It's time to relax for a vacation, and you finally found your perfect spot. Alas, you're not alone...

There is only one beach and you are a disgruntled, selfish penguin. Dash, stomp and slap your way to vacation supremacy in this chaotic multiplayer brawl.

Control the terrain by changing it to your color. Dash your way across the map, jump and stomp the ground to fling your opponents, or give them the ol' flipper to the head to send them packing to the nearest pit.

Play from 2 to 4 players in local multiplayer, or up to 8 players online (with rollback!) accompanied by a colorful low-poly style and sweet bumpy tunes by Dale North.

Duke it out on hundreds of maps with different gimmicks and items, or create your own with the level editor and play them with your friends locally or online.

Important Note: This is a multiplayer only game! No single player is included
